name: Virtua Cop: Elite Edition
description:
Virtua Cop: Elite Edition is an action-shooter game developed by AM2. It was originally released in 2002. Acclaim Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Virtua Cop: Elite Edition is available on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Toshinori Asai. It was directed by Jun'etsu Kakuta. It was scored by Kentaro Koyama (Arcade), PC) and Tatsuya Kozaki (Saturn.
